gist.headline: Maximum Brainrot
gist.blurb: The hive is embracing the chaos. BrainrotMaker has landed in the Creative showcase for all your high-speed meme generation needs.
gist.summary: Added BrainrotMaker to the community apps list, offering rapid generation of internet-culture imagery.
gist.impact: Users can now access a dedicated tool for generating 'brainrot' style images directly from the apps showcase.
gist.visual_concept: The concept of 'brainrot' (chaotic internet memes/overstimulation) represented in a cozy way. Polly the bee watching a screen that is exploding with colorful, glitchy pixel confetti.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot wearing cool sunglasses, looking at a retro monitor displaying colorful chaotic glitch art. A small robot companion looks mesmerized. Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel purple gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'BRAINROT'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
